column4: I don't want it to go into standby mode, I just want it to turn off the drives, but leave the other parts on. Can't I do that?
have you looked at Laptop Mode Tools (http://samwel.tk/laptop_mode/) be careful using it on desktop hard drives since they are not designed for the same number of spin-up/spin-downs
did you do a google search for linux spin down hard drive? There are some tips for using hdparm
